body:
Comment 4: 
The go/types API now exposes two additional functions:

- NewChecker creates a new instance of a types.Checker for a (presumably "empty") package
- Checker.Files permits adding sets of additional package files that type-check together
with any previously added package files.

The mechanism is partly implemented. Missing: if Checker.Files adds methods to
previously defined types, those methods will not be recognized. Work in progress.
_Status changed to **Started**._
